raw_body: COOREY,​ LEILA LAKSHMI – Widow of the late Deshamanya C.A. Coorey,​ daughter of the late Dr Alfred & Muriel De Silva and sister of the late Chitra Dias and the late Tilak De Silva,​ beloved mother of Dilrukshi De Silva,​ Sharmini Coorey and the late Mohan and Anura Coorey,​ mother-in-law of Dr S.R. De Silva and John Hicklin,​ beloved grandmother of Tashya,​ Shiraj,​ Alastaire,​ Shalini,​ Oliver and Chanelle and beloved great grandmother of Eshan and Kiyan,​ passed away peacefully on the 29th of December 2023. Remains lie at 128,​ Park Road,​ Colombo 5,​ on Saturday,​ 30th of December 2023 from 9 a.m. Cremation at 1 p.m. on the 30th of December 2023 at the (Old Crematorium) General Cemetery,​ Borella.085582
